text: The Miss Perú 1981 pageant was held on June 27, 1981. That year, 18 candidates were competing for the national crown. The chosen winner represented Peru at the Miss Universe 1981.http://www.pageantopolis.com/universe-lists-p- to-z.htmlThe rest of the finalists would enter in different pageants.http://www.caretas.com.pe/Main.asp?T=3082&idE;=874&idA;=45849#.VAHAs8VdXSE ==Placements== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size: 95%;" !width="220" style="background-color:#787878;color:#FFFFFF;"|Final Results !width="300" style="background-color:#787878;color:#FFFFFF;"|Contestant |- | Miss Peru Universe 1981 | * 22px Region Lima - Gladys Silva |- | Miss Peru Playa 1981 | *22px Lambayeque - Lucila Boggiano |- | 1st Runner-Up | *22px Moquegua - Lorena Castro |- | 2nd Runner-Up | *22px Tacna - Patricia Calderón Mickle |- | Top 8 | * 22px Piura - Carolina Seminario * 22px Ucayali - Patricia Hart * 22px San Martín - Karin Bartra * 22px Amazonas - Patricia Heller |} ==Special Awards== * Best Regional Costume - La Libertad - Marylin Vega * Miss Photogenic - Lambayeque - Lucila Boggiano * Miss Elegance - Tacna - Patricia Calderón * Miss Body - Moquegua - Lorena Castro * Best Hair - Piura - Carolina Seminario * Miss Congeniality - Junín - Emma Ugarte * Most Beautiful Face - Lambayeque - Lucila Boggiano . ==Delegates== *Amazonas - Patricia Heller *Apurímac - Elena Serra *Cajamarca - María Soledad Mariátegui *Callao - Marilú Choza Balarezo *Cuzco - Claudia Farfan Kilian *Europe Perú - Carolina Kecskemeti *Huancavelica - Julia Flores Cosme *Junín - Emma Ugarte *La Libertad - Marylin Vega Esparza *Lambayeque - Lucila Boggiano *Loreto - Concepcion Pineda *Madre de Dios - Giuliana Martinetti *Moquegua - Lorena Castro *Piura - Carolina Seminario *Region Lima - Gladys Silva *San Martín - Karin Bartra *Tacna - Patricia Calderón Mickle *Ucayali - Patricia Hart == References == Category:Miss Peru Category:1981 in Peru Category:1981 beauty pageants
title: Miss Perú 1981
